name: 李文亞
objective:
半導體製造技術是近年來最關鍵的技術，本課程涵蓋了基於各種半導體製程知識以及先進元件發展，來協助學子進一步了解半導體的實際應用。(此課程為外國學生為主要上課學員，將以全英文教學進行)
Semiconductor manufacturing technology is one of the most advanced technologies in recent years. This course covers the knowledge of various semiconductor fabrication processes and advanced devices to help students further understand the practical applications of semiconductors.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to the Semiconductor Industry Chain and Nanotechnology
Week 2: Semiconductor Physics
Week 3: Electrical fundamentals
Week 4: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Silicon Wafer
Week 5: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Oxidation and Diffusion
Week 6: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Photolithography
Week 7: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Ion Implantation and Plasma
Week 8: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Etching
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD)
Week 11: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Metallization and Physical Vapor Deposition (PVD)
Week 12: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Chemical Mechanical Polishing (CMP)
Week 13: Semiconductor Manufacturing: Process Integration
Week 14: Advanced Semiconductor Devices
Week 15: Nanotechnology: Fullerene & Carbon nanotubes
Week 16: Nanotechnology: Graphene
Week 17: Nanotechnology: 2D Materials
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Class quiz 30%
Midterm 30%
Final report 30%
